posts.title: Access admin panel with http://localhost:5173/admin
posts.text:
You can configure and make posts from the admin page - this will be your base URL (if running locally, this is localhost:5173) and /admin. Expand the Auth section, and set your password before attempting to make changes.

Set your password in terminal (windows)
$env:ADMIN_SECRET='super-long-random-string'

or bash (linux)
export ADMIN_SECRET='super-long-random-string'
